complaints.subject: Ineffective Drone Spraying Quality
complaints.description: Hello there, I am experiencing an issue when logging into my hosting account using the email address example@gmail.com Upon logging in, I receive the following message: Functionality is restricted. Could you please investigate and resolve this issue as soon as possible? Thank you for your support Best regards,

complaints.complainTitle: Questioning the Accuracy of Crop Monitoring Reports
complaints.subject: Questioning the Accuracy of Crop Monitoring Reports
complaints.description: I have concerns about the accuracy of the crop monitoring reports provided by your service. The data does not seem to match what I am observing in the field.

complaints.complainTitle: Delayed Response Time for Technical Support
complaints.subject: Delayed Response Time for Technical Support
complaints.description: I have been waiting for over 48 hours for a response from technical support regarding my equipment malfunction. This delay is affecting my operations.

complaints.subject: Billing Discrepancy in Monthly Invoice
complaints.description: There appears to be a discrepancy in my monthly invoice. I was charged for services that were not provided last month.

complaints.subject: Equipment Malfunction During Peak Season
complaints.description: The drone equipment malfunctioned during the peak spraying season, causing significant delays and losses. I need immediate assistance.

complaints.subject: Inconsistent Service Quality
complaints.description: The service quality has been inconsistent over the past few months. Some visits are excellent, while others are below standard.

complaints.subject: Missing Data in Weekly Reports
complaints.description: Several data points are missing from my weekly crop monitoring reports. This makes it difficult to track progress effectively.

complaints.subject: Poor Communication from Field Agents
complaints.description: The field agents assigned to my account rarely communicate updates or changes in schedule, leading to confusion and missed appointments.

complaints.subject: Unauthorized Charges on Account
complaints.description: I noticed unauthorized charges on my account for services I did not request or approve. Please investigate immediately.

complaints.complainTitle: Damaged Crops Due to Incorrect Spraying
complaints.subject: Damaged Crops Due to Incorrect Spraying
complaints.description: My crops were damaged due to incorrect spraying techniques used by your team. I need compensation for the losses.

complaints.subject: Late Arrival of Field Agents
complaints.description: Field agents consistently arrive late for scheduled appointments, causing disruptions to my daily operations.

complaints.subject: Incomplete Training for New Equipment
complaints.description: The training provided for the new equipment was incomplete and insufficient. I still have many questions about proper usage.

complaints.subject: Software App Crashes Frequently
complaints.description: The mobile app crashes frequently, making it difficult to access important information and submit service requests.

complaints.subject: Unclear Pricing Structure
complaints.description: The pricing structure for additional services is unclear and confusing. I need better transparency in billing.

complaints.subject: No Follow-up After Service Completion
complaints.description: There is no follow-up from the team after service completion to ensure satisfaction or address any concerns.

complaints.subject: Difficulty Scheduling Appointments
complaints.description: The appointment scheduling system is difficult to use and often shows incorrect availability times.
